ImageFileUploader.name: Image File Uploader
ImageFileUploader.description: Allows to scale images before they are uploaded

samples.name: Image File Uploader
samples.description: Scale image by factor of 0.5 before uploading it.

samples.name: Image File Uploader Mimes
samples.description: Allow only pdf, jpg, and png mimes to be selected.

samples.name: Image File Uploader Boundary
samples.description: Use scaleType "Boundary" and set max scaled size to 3 MB.

samples.name: Image File Uploader Upload Type
samples.description: Use uploadType "jpg" + use scaledJpgQuality = 1 (i.e. png files will be converted to jpeg and then uploaded).

samples.name: Image File Uploader Condition Size
samples.description: Use scaleType "Boundary" but scale only if file is larger than 5 MB.

samples.name: Image File Uploader Condition Resolution
samples.description: Use scaleType "Boundary" but scale only if resolution > 1680 * 1050

samples.name: Image File Uploader Condition Boundary
samples.description: Use scaleType "Boundary" but scale only if width > 1680 or height > 1050 pixels.

samples.name: Image File Uploader Condition Any
samples.description: Use scaleType "Boundary" but scale only if file size, boundary, or resolution condition matches.
